content: What major sporting event takes place annually on the first Saturday in May at Churchill Downs in Louisville, Kentucky?

The major sporting event that takes place annually on the first Saturday in May at Churchill Downs in Louisville, Kentucky, is the Kentucky Derby. It is often referred to as "The Most Exciting Two Minutes in Sports" due to its short duration but high level of excitement. The Kentucky Derby is the first leg of the American Triple Crown of Thoroughbred Racing, followed by the Preakness Stakes and the Belmont Stakes.
